rooms.description: A spacious living room with Mediterranean-style finishes and wheelchair accessible design. Vastu-compliant orientation ensures natural light flow.
An inviting dining area that doubles as a casual lounge, designed for easy access with wide doorways and smooth transitions.
A functional Mediterranean kitchen equipped with wheelchair-friendly counters and accessible storage spaces.
A ground-floor bathroom with grab bars, non-slip surfaces and Vastu-compliant placement near the entrance for easy accessibility.
A primary bedroom designed with accessible fixtures and ample natural light. Incorporates Mediterranean color palette, adhering to Vastu principles of calm energy.
Additional bedroom that is wheelchair friendly with adjustable features, designed with privacy in mind and Vastu-compliant layout for balance.

openings.description: Main entrance door with a wide threshold suitable for wheelchair access, complemented by natural lighting to adhere to Vastu norms.
Secondary exit/entrance designed for emergency and additional accessibility options.

additional_features.description: A quiet, Vastu-compliant study/library area integrated into the living space with a dedicated shelving system and comfortable seating.
An accessible swimming pool area featuring a ramped entry to ensure wheelchair accessibility, complementing the farmhouse aesthetic.

notes: Total area approximated: 2500 sqft across levels.
Design ensures compliance with local building norms and Vastu principles.
Budget constraints have been considered by optimizing space utilization and material choices.
